website_summaries.verdict: The classic cushion-free ottoman design matches or coordinates with a number of outdoor patio sets. Handsome with a subtle black and tan finish.
pros: Aluminum frame is sturdy yet lightweight
A comfortable footrest height for most people
it can also serve as seating for up to 200 lb
Holds a tray if you need extra table space
If you buy multiples, they’re stackable for storage
cons: It may be slightly too high as a footrest for a few people

customer_reviews.title: Perfect outdoor ottoman
customer_reviews.text: The ottomans are the right height to put in front of our swivel rocker patio chairs. Even though the color on the ottoman is slightly darker than our chairs, it coordinates beautifully. The ottomans are lightweight, yet we have had no problem with the wind blowing them around. You may have to watch the color of frame you are ordering, though, as one site we saw said the frame was a wine/burgundy color and another, black. We bought the black frames which match our patio set frames. Other than that, the ottomans were the same. We recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: AZ golfer

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We didn’t want a huge heavy piece of furniture for a foot stool and this is PERFECT! This is well made but lightweight and easy to move around our patio furniture. The black and brown matches our chairs and looks great! Seller expedited shipping and we got it in a few days...well packaged in excellent condition. Highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in our small space
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a small chair or stool to put on our front porch. Everything was too big. I just needed something to sit on while I took the dog out to play & do her "business". I used to just sit on a step, but now I can sit on this "foot stool". It looks very attractive & doesn't take up the whole front porch.
customer_reviews.author: short sandy

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are everything we were looking for. They are easy to move around, they’re stackable and are the right height so they’re very comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: JSO

customer_reviews.title: High quality, Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. They arrived quickly; carefully wrapped to prevent damage. Sitting on the lanai is much more comfortable now that we can put our feet up. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Ander

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: It came fully assembled. It could be just a bit lower for a comfortable foot stool. Very impressive stying.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Ready to go
customer_reviews.text: No assembly, quick delivery, can be footstool, bench, or with adding a tray, a side table.
customer_reviews.author: book lady

customer_reviews.title: Photo of Product didn't match what was received.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the stool in October of 2018 and was very pleased with it. Recently, I decided to order another one and was happy it was shown as available with the same material. Unfortunately, when it arrived, it was a different material and did not match. Very disappointed. Beware product shown may not be product you receive.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B. Gale

customer_reviews.title: The it is attractive and strong.
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our patio setting. My wife and I share it when we are sitting together.
customer_reviews.author: George McCreedy

customer_reviews.title: Good value for cost.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and color was very close. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves to sit with his feet up. This simple lightweight stool looks great with our patio furniture—and it didn’t cost a fortune.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, fits right in
customer_reviews.text: It arrived and fit right in. No assembly, neat item.
customer_reviews.author: wingingit

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Will work great with just about any brand of similar chairs
customer_reviews.author: F. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one for husbby
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is price. But, I would still buy again
customer_reviews.author: NEA Realtor

customer_reviews.title: wonderful ottomans
customer_reviews.text: great to go with outdoor chairs. one did have a snag in material
customer_reviews.author: mporter

customer_reviews.title: Love my new footstool.
customer_reviews.text: Blends in perfectly with my front porch and furniture. I love being able to easily move it around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked so much I bought a second
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe how well it matches/complements our current furniture. Keeping fingers crossed it wears well. Super comfortable. Price was right, too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tannen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very light which is a good thing or bad if you want something more sturdy. But the look is great.
customer_reviews.author: foobeeyou

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Completely as advertised. A little taller than some others but perfect for my taller patio chairs.
customer_reviews.author: larry goetz

customer_reviews.title: Great looking footstool
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable. Even though not a set, matched patio furniture I purchased from Amazon last year.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: It came assembled. I had one and wanted a second one.
customer_reviews.author: colette Downs

customer_reviews.title: Order comes with 2 footrests
customer_reviews.text: They look good their light and remember my order contained 2 footrests!
customer_reviews.author: Peter L. Baiata

customer_reviews.title: It is as described in the product description
customer_reviews.text: This patio ottoman is wide, comfortable, and of good quality at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Louise from CA

customer_reviews.title: This is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described - it is lightweight, well-made. Colors are very neutral
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and comfortable to rest feet on. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Youngren

customer_reviews.title: Nice neutral black :& tan colors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this patio ottoman mainly because I needed something with black metal to match the chairs it would be used with. I only purchased one to share between two chairs due to the small space I have.. The chairs have cushions but the tan is neutral enough to go with okay. The price was the lowest I found for this type product.
customer_reviews.author: eusrIMHO

customer_reviews.title: Matches our chairs
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a foot stool for our deck chairs and this matches closely. It fills our need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

product_meta.title: J&M Patio Outdoor Ottoman 17" H Aluminum Relaxing Footstool in Black & Tan Finish
product_meta.description: Complete your outdoor chat set with this Ottoman for another place to unwind. Wielded with a powder-coated finish, this weather-resistant footstool holds up against the elements. Its traditional design features coarse fabric, muted colors and soft lines. With this Ottoman under your feet, you can kick back and relax in the fresh air. Dimensions: 17'' H x 22'' W x 22'' D. Weight capacity: 200 pounds.
feature_bullets: Outdoor Ottoman with traditional design and soft lines.
Dimensions: 17'' H x 22'' W x 22'' D. Weight capacity: 200 pounds. Color: Black and Tan.
Features coarse fabric, powder-coated finish, aluminum frame.
This weather-resistant footstool holds up against the elements, is very comfortable and has right height for legs
Complete your outdoor chat set with this Ottoman for another place to unwind.
